00001 /*---------------------------------------------------------------------------
00002 ;       Copyright (C) 2002 CYGNAL INTEGRATED PRODUCTS, INC.
00003 ;       All rights reserved.
00004 ;
00005 ;
00006 ;       FILE NAME       : C8051F310.H
00007 ;       TARGET MCUs     : C8051F310, 'F311
00008 ;       DESCRIPTION     : Register/bit definitions for the C8051F31x product family.
00009 ;
00010 ;  REVISION 1.2
00011 ;     -- Added VDM0CN (0xff)
00012 ;
00013 ;       REVISION 1.1
00014 ;     -- SPICFG --> SPI0CFG
00015 ;     -- SPICKR --> SPI0CKR
00016 ;     -- SPIDAT --> SPI0DAT
00017 ;     -- removed CLKMUL (0xb9)
00018 ;     -- AMUX0N --> AMX0N
00019 ;     -- AMUX0P --> AMX0P
00020 ;
00021 ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------*/

00127 /*  BIT Registers  */
00128 
00129 /*  TCON  0x88 */
00130 sbit IT0     = TCON ^ 0;   /* EXT INTERRUPT 0 TYPE                                  */
00131 sbit IE0     = TCON ^ 1;   /* EXT INTERRUPT 0 EDGE FLAG                             */
00132 sbit IT1     = TCON ^ 2;   /* EXT INTERRUPT 1 TYPE                                  */
00133 sbit IE1     = TCON ^ 3;   /* EXT INTERRUPT 1 EDGE FLAG                             */
00134 sbit TR0     = TCON ^ 4;   /* TIMER 0 ON/OFF CONTROL                                */
00135 sbit TF0     = TCON ^ 5;   /* TIMER 0 OVERFLOW FLAG                                 */
00136 sbit TR1     = TCON ^ 6;   /* TIMER 1 ON/OFF CONTROL                                */
00137 sbit TF1     = TCON ^ 7;   /* TIMER 1 OVERFLOW FLAG                                 */
00138 
00139 /*  SCON0  0x98 */
00140 sbit RI0     = SCON0 ^ 0;  /* RECEIVE INTERRUPT FLAG                                */
00141 sbit TI0     = SCON0 ^ 1;  /* TRANSMIT INTERRUPT FLAG                               */
00142 sbit RB80    = SCON0 ^ 2;  /* RECEIVE BIT 8                                         */
00143 sbit TB80    = SCON0 ^ 3;  /* TRANSMIT BIT 8                                        */
00144 sbit REN0    = SCON0 ^ 4;  /* RECEIVE ENABLE                                        */
00145 sbit MCE0    = SCON0 ^ 5;  /* MULTIPROCESSOR COMMUNICATION ENABLE                   */
00146 sbit S0MODE  = SCON0 ^ 7;  /* SERIAL MODE CONTROL BIT 0                             */
00147 
00148 /*  IE  0xA8 */
00149 sbit EX0     = IE ^ 0;     /* EXTERNAL INTERRUPT 0 ENABLE                           */
00150 sbit ET0     = IE ^ 1;     /* TIMER 0 INTERRUPT ENABLE                              */
00151 sbit EX1     = IE ^ 2;     /* EXTERNAL INTERRUPT 1 ENABLE                           */
00152 sbit ET1     = IE ^ 3;     /* TIMER 1 INTERRUPT ENABLE                              */
00153 sbit ES0     = IE ^ 4;     /* UART0 INTERRUPT ENABLE                                */
00154 sbit ET2     = IE ^ 5;     /* TIMER 2 INTERRUPT ENABLE                              */
00155 sbit EA      = IE ^ 7;     /* GLOBAL INTERRUPT ENABLE                               */
00156 
00157 /*  IP  0xB8 */
00158 sbit PX0     = IP ^ 0;     /* EXTERNAL INTERRUPT 0 PRIORITY                         */
00159 sbit PT0     = IP ^ 1;     /* TIMER 0 PRIORITY                                      */
00160 sbit PX1     = IP ^ 2;     /* EXTERNAL INTERRUPT 1 PRIORITY                         */
00161 sbit PT1     = IP ^ 3;     /* TIMER 1 PRIORITY                                      */
00162 sbit PS0     = IP ^ 4;     /* UART0 PRIORITY                                        */
00163 sbit PT2     = IP ^ 5;     /* TIMER 2 PRIORITY                                      */
00164 
00165 /* SMB0CN 0xC0 */
00166 sbit SI      = SMB0CN ^ 0; /* SMBUS0 INTERRUPT FLAG                                 */
00167 sbit ACK     = SMB0CN ^ 1; /* ACKNOWLEDGE FLAG                                      */
00168 sbit ARBLOST = SMB0CN ^ 2; /* ARBITRATION LOST INDICATOR                            */
00169 sbit ACKRQ   = SMB0CN ^ 3; /* ACKNOWLEDGE REQUEST                                   */
00170 sbit STO     = SMB0CN ^ 4; /* STOP FLAG                                             */
00171 sbit STA     = SMB0CN ^ 5; /* START FLAG                                            */
00172 sbit TXMODE  = SMB0CN ^ 6; /* TRANSMIT MODE INDICATOR                               */
00173 sbit MASTER  = SMB0CN ^ 7; /* MASTER/SLAVE INDICATOR                                */
00174 
00175 /*  TMR2CN 0xC8 */
00176 sbit T2XCLK  = TMR2CN ^ 0; /* TIMER 2 EXTERNAL CLOCK SELECT                         */
00177 sbit TR2     = TMR2CN ^ 2; /* TIMER 2 ON/OFF CONTROL                                */
00178 sbit T2SPLIT = TMR2CN ^ 3; /* TIMER 2 SPLIT MODE ENABLE                             */
00179 sbit TF2LEN  = TMR2CN ^ 5; /* TIMER 2 LOW BYTE INTERRUPT ENABLE                     */
00180 sbit TF2L    = TMR2CN ^ 6; /* TIMER 2 LOW BYTE OVERFLOW FLAG                        */
00181 sbit TF2H    = TMR2CN ^ 7; /* TIMER 2 HIGH BYTE OVERFLOW FLAG                       */
00182 
00183 /*  PSW 0xD0 */
00184 sbit P       = PSW ^ 0;    /* ACCUMULATOR PARITY FLAG                               */
00185 sbit F1      = PSW ^ 1;    /* USER FLAG 1                                           */
00186 sbit OV      = PSW ^ 2;    /* OVERFLOW FLAG                                         */
00187 sbit RS0     = PSW ^ 3;    /* REGISTER BANK SELECT 0                                */
00188 sbit RS1     = PSW ^ 4;    /* REGISTER BANK SELECT 1                                */
00189 sbit F0      = PSW ^ 5;    /* USER FLAG 0                                           */
00190 sbit AC      = PSW ^ 6;    /* AUXILIARY CARRY FLAG                                  */
00191 sbit CY      = PSW ^ 7;    /* CARRY FLAG                                            */
00192 
00193 /* PCA0CN 0xD8H */
00194 sbit CCF0    = PCA0CN ^ 0; /* PCA0 MODULE 0 CAPTURE/COMPARE FLAG                    */
00195 sbit CCF1    = PCA0CN ^ 1; /* PCA0 MODULE 1 CAPTURE/COMPARE FLAG                    */
00196 sbit CCF2    = PCA0CN ^ 2; /* PCA0 MODULE 2 CAPTURE/COMPARE FLAG                    */
00197 sbit CCF3    = PCA0CN ^ 3; /* PCA0 MODULE 3 CAPTURE/COMPARE FLAG                    */
00198 sbit CCF4    = PCA0CN ^ 4; /* PCA0 MODULE 4 CAPTURE/COMPARE FLAG                    */
00199 sbit CR      = PCA0CN ^ 6; /* PCA0 COUNTER RUN CONTROL                              */
00200 sbit CF      = PCA0CN ^ 7; /* PCA0 COUNTER OVERFLOW FLAG                            */
00201 
00202 /* ADC0CN 0xE8H */
00203 sbit AD0CM0  = ADC0CN ^ 0; /* ADC0 CONVERSION MODE SELECT 0                         */
00204 sbit AD0CM1  = ADC0CN ^ 1; /* ADC0 CONVERSION MODE SELECT 1                         */
00205 sbit AD0CM2  = ADC0CN ^ 2; /* ADC0 CONVERSION MODE SELECT 2                         */
00206 sbit AD0WINT = ADC0CN ^ 3; /* ADC0 WINDOW COMPARE INTERRUPT FLAG                    */
00207 sbit AD0BUSY = ADC0CN ^ 4; /* ADC0 BUSY FLAG                                        */
00208 sbit AD0INT  = ADC0CN ^ 5; /* ADC0 CONVERISION COMPLETE INTERRUPT FLAG              */
00209 sbit AD0TM   = ADC0CN ^ 6; /* ADC0 TRACK MODE                                       */
00210 sbit AD0EN   = ADC0CN ^ 7; /* ADC0 ENABLE                                           */
00211 
00212 /* SPI0CN 0xF8H */
00213 sbit SPIF    = SPI0CN ^ 7; /* SPI 0 INTERRUPT FLAG                                  */
00214 sbit WCOL    = SPI0CN ^ 6; /* SPI 0 WRITE COLLISION FLAG                            */
00215 sbit MODF    = SPI0CN ^ 5; /* SPI 0 MODE FAULT FLAG                                 */
00216 sbit RXOVRN  = SPI0CN ^ 4; /* SPI 0 RX OVERRUN FLAG                                 */
00217 sbit TXBSY   = SPI0CN ^ 3; /* SPI 0 SLAVE SELECT MODE 1                             */
00218 sbit SLVSEL  = SPI0CN ^ 2; /* SPI 0 SLAVE SELECT MODE 0                             */
00219 sbit TXBMT   = SPI0CN ^ 1; /* SPI 0 TRANSMIT BUFFER EMPTY                           */
00220 sbit SPIEN   = SPI0CN ^ 0; /* SPI 0 SPI ENABLE                                      */
